Package biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

Class FileSystemOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.FileSystemOptionsBuilder
  • public class FileSystemOptionsBuilder
extends Object

    Responsible for creating value of the file system options.

    Example code: 

     List<FileSystemOption> fileSystems;
 // create a list with standard file systems
 fileSystems = new FileSystemOptionsBuilder().appendHttp().appendLocal().build();
 
 // create a list with standard file systems (short version)
 fileSystems = new FileSystemOptionsBuilder().appendStandard().build();
 
 // create a list with  file system
 class CustomFileSystem implements FileSystem {
      // omitted implementation
 }
 
 fileSystems = new FileSystemOptionsBuilder().appendCustom(CustomFileSystem.class).build();

    Warning: the local file system should be appended as last or not at all.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    See Also:
    FileSystemOptionBuilder, LessOptions

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileSystemOptionsBuilder

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder()
        Constructs a new instance.
        Since:
        2.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • appendStandard

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendStandard()
        Appends standard file systems with no parameters at the end. If any file system (with no parameters) was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again. Appended file systems:
        1. HttpFileSystem
        2. FtpFileSystem (only if Apache Commons Net library in the class path)
        3. LocalFileSystem
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • appendLocal

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendLocal()
        Appends the LocalFileSystem with no parameters at the end. If the file system (with no parameters) was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • appendHttp

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendHttp()
        Appends the HttpFileSystem with no parameters at the end. If the file system (with no parameters) was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • appendFtp

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendFtp()

        Appends the FtpFileSystem with no parameters at the end. If the file system (with no parameters) was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again.

        Warning: requires Apache Commons Net library in the class path.

        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • appendClassPath

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendClassPath()
        Appends the ClassPathFileSystem with no parameters at the end. If the file system (with no parameters) was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • appendCustom

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendCustom​(Class<? extends FileSystem>... classes)
        Appends file systems specified by classes with no parameters at the end. If any file system (with no parameters) was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again.
        Parameters:
        classes - the file system classes.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is the file system classes are equal to null.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • appendCustom

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendCustom​(Class<? extends FileSystem> clazz)
        Appends a file system specified by class with no parameters at the end. If the file system (with no parameters) was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the file system class.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is the file system class is equal to null.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • appendCustom

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendCustom​(Class<? extends FileSystem> clazz,
                                             Map<String,​String> parameters)
        Appends a file system specified by class with parameters at the end. If the file system with the same parameters was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the file system class.
        parameters - the configuration parameters.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is the file system class or parameters are equal to null.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • appendCustom

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendCustom​(FileSystemOption... options)
        Appends file system options at the end. If any file system option was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again.
        Parameters:
        options - the file system options.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is the options is equal to null.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • appendCustom

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendCustom​(Iterable<? extends FileSystemOption> options)
        Appends file system options at the end. If any file system option was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again.
        Parameters:
        options - the file system options.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is the options is equal to null.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • appendCustom

        public FileSystemOptionsBuilder appendCustom​(FileSystemOption option)
        Appends a file system option at the end. If the file system option was appended before, then it will be removed and appended again.
        Parameters:
        option - the file system option.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is the fileSystemOption is equal to null.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • build

        public List<FileSystemOption> build()

        Builds a list with file system options.

        Warning: the local file system should be appended as last or not at all.

        Returns:
        the list with class names.
        Since:
        2.0.0
